mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT TT2.deleyn, TT1.orddat, TT.sddate, TT3.wktynm, 999 AS box, TT.wkonum, TT3.wktynm, BZ.name1, TT.assycd, TT.komtx, TT2.otbxlb, TT.wkstat, TT.qtyhtim, TT.qtyout,
TT.qtyout+TT.qtyout1 AS OUTQTY, TT.qtyout1, TT.qtyhtim - (TT.qtyout+TT.qtyout1) AS QTY, TT.qtyhtim - (TT.qtyout+TT.qtyout1) AS INPUTQTY
FROM ( SELECT T1.wkonum, T1.ospser, T1.assycd, T2.komtx, T1.wkstat, T1.wktype, T1.sddate, T1.wrkopt, 999 AS qtyhtim, 999 AS qtyout , 999 AS qtyout1
FROM aitem T1 INNER JOIN prd_mst T2 ON T1.assycd = T2.matnr WHERE T2.company = '1000' ORDER BY T1.wkonum, T1.assycd DESC ) TT, wkord TT1, stock TT2, WKTYP TT3, vnd_mst BZ WHERE TT.wkonum = TT1.wkonum AND TT.wkonum = TT2.wkonum AND TT.assycd = TT2.assycd AND TT.ospser = TT2.ospser AND TT.wktype = TT3.wktycd AND TT2.qtyitm > 0 AND TT2.kndstk = '1' AND TT1.cornum = BZ.lifnr

SELECT DISTINCT T1.asndky, T1.asndit, T2.cornum, BZ.name1, T1.wkonum, T1.assycd, SK.komtx, T1.otbxlb, T1.qtyout, T1.outdat, T1.outtim
FROM stbot T1, wkord T2, asndh AH, prd_mst SK, vnd_mst BZ WHERE T1.asndky = AH.asndky AND T1.wkonum = T2.wkonum AND T2.cornum = BZ.lifnr AND T1.assycd = SK.matnr AND AH.statdo= 'NEW'
